code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Procent=_ref=>{let{onClose,onSubmit}=_ref;const[service,setService]=useState("");const[discount,setDiscount]=useState("");const[addToBill,setAddToBill]=useState("");const[subtractFromBill,setSubtractFromBill]=useState("");const handleSubmit=()=>{onSubmit({service:parseFloat(service)||0,discount:parseFloat(discount)||0,addToBill:parseFloat(addToBill)||0,subtractFromBill:parseFloat(subtractFromBill)||0});onClose();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"procent-modal",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Ustawienia Procentowe"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Serwis (%)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",min:"0",value:service,onChange:e=>setService(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Zni\u017Cka (%)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",min:"0",value:discount,onChange:e=>setDiscount(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Dodaj do rachunku"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",min:"0",value:addToBill,onChange:e=>setAddToBill(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Odejmij od rachunku"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",min:"0",value:subtractFromBill,onChange:e=>setSubtractFromBill(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modal-buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSubmit,children:"Zatwierd\u017A"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:onClose,children:"Zamknij"})]})]});};export default Procent;
